name: System Overhaul
description:
Play as a character with a helmet in a futuristic city and save the world from a dictatorship by exploring areas, solving puzzles to enter restricted zones, and killing enemies.

Controls

A - Strafe left

D - Strafe right

W - Walk Forward

S - Walk Backwards

Space - Jump

E - Shield Ability

F - “Interact”

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Left Control - Crouch

Q - Radar Ability

Esc - Pause/Unpause
